projects.title: Email Automation System
projects.description: LLM-based chatbot system for automating email responses and customer interactions
details: Integrated GPT and BERT models to analyze and generate appropriate email responses
Implemented NLP classification system to prioritize and categorize incoming emails
Built FastAPI backend for seamless integration with existing email systems
Reduced customer response time by 65% and improved satisfaction metrics

projects.title: LLM-Model-Comparison
projects.description: Comparative analysis of various Large Language Models for different NLP tasks
details: Conducted a comprehensive benchmark analysis of multiple Large Language Models
Evaluated performance across various metrics including accuracy, speed, and resource usage
Compared models for specific NLP tasks including text generation and summarization
Presented findings using interactive visualizations and comparative charts

projects.title: ATS-System-Using-LLM(Gemini)
projects.description: AI-powered Applicant Tracking System that uses Google's Gemini LLM to screen resumes
details: Built an Applicant Tracking System leveraging Google's Gemini LLM technology
Implemented automated resume screening and candidate ranking features
Designed an intuitive interface for HR professionals to manage applications
Used Natural Language Processing to extract and evaluate candidate qualifications

projects.title: Linear-Regression-Model
projects.description: Predictive model using linear regression to forecast student scores based on study hours
details: Implemented linear regression algorithm to predict student scores based on study time
Created data visualization to demonstrate the relationship between study hours and performance
Evaluated model performance using R-squared and Mean Squared Error metrics
Developed a solution that can be used for academic planning and intervention

projects.title: Data-analysis-on-Zomato-dataset
projects.description: A comprehensive analysis of Zomato restaurant data to derive business insights and patterns
details: Performed Exploratory Data Analysis (EDA) on Zomato dataset to extract meaningful insights
Created visualizations to identify trends and patterns in restaurant ratings and cuisines
Analyzed geographical distribution and customer preferences by location
Implemented data cleaning and preprocessing techniques to ensure quality analysis

projects.title: Salary-Prediction-using-Machine-Learning
projects.description: ML model that predicts salary based on years of professional experience
details: Developed a machine learning model to predict salaries based on years of experience
Implemented data preprocessing and feature engineering techniques
Trained and evaluated multiple regression models to find the best performer
Created visualizations to explain the relationship between experience and compensation

projects.title: ATS-System-Using-Gemini
projects.description: AI-powered Applicant Tracking System that uses Google's Gemini LLM to screen resumes
details: Built an Applicant Tracking System leveraging Google's Gemini LLM technology
Implemented automated resume screening and candidate ranking features
Designed an intuitive interface for HR professionals to manage applications
Used Natural Language Processing to extract and evaluate candidate qualifications

projects.title: Portfolio Website
projects.description: Professional portfolio website to showcase my projects and skills in AI and software development
details: Created responsive design using HTML5, CSS3 and JavaScript
Implemented modern UI elements and animations with AI-themed visuals
Designed for optimal user experience across all device sizes
Dynamic content loading from JSON data source with GitHub integration
